body_html: You can get the sources from github (check out the code at the r0.8 branch if you're using the r0.8 wheel). The models code aren't really core libraries, just examples. I'd like to remove mnist/cifar10 from the pip wheel too. Unless someone can convince me otherwise, it's weird to me to have models be part of the pip installed package.

body: You can get the sources from github (check out the code at the r0.8 branch if you're using the r0.8 wheel).  The models code aren't really core libraries, just examples.  I'd like to remove mnist/cifar10 from the pip wheel too.  Unless someone can convince me otherwise, it's weird to me to have models be part of the pip installed package.
